substantially.over: CBOW and biL - STM Encoder baselines

improve.from sentence: First for Multi - NLI , we improve substantially over the CBOW and biL - STM Encoder baselines reported in the dataset paper .

our final shortcut - based stacked encod.from sentence: We also show that our final shortcut - based stacked encoder achieves around 3 % improvement as compared to the 1 layer biLSTM - Max Encoder in the second last row ( using the exact same classifier and optimizer settings ) .

shortcut - encoder.from sentence: Our shortcut - encoder was also the top singe - model ( non-ensemble ) result on the EMNLP RepEval Shared Task leaderboard .

shortcutstacked encoder.from sentence: Next , for SNLI , we compare our shortcutstacked encoder with the current state - of - the - art encoders from the SNLI leaderboard ( https :// nlp.stanford.edu/projects/snli/ ) .

Our Shortcut - Stacked Encoder.sur-passes: all the previous state - of - the - art encoders

recent biLSTM - Max Encoder.from sentence:
We also compare to the recent biLSTM - Max Encoder of , which served as our model 's 1 - layer starting point .
The results indicate that ' Our Shortcut - Stacked Encoder ' sur-passes all the previous state - of - the - art encoders , and achieves the new best encoding - based result on SNLI , suggesting the general effectiveness of simple shortcut - connected stacked layers in sentence encoders .
